name: Swingy Angie
description:
Swingy Angie: Road to Heaven

Addictive, one-finger arcade game inspired by a popular title.

Tap to change direction.

Avoid the devils.

Help Angie ascend to heaven.

Double-tap the angel on the title screen to reset score.
